ygData.subject: Please help
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 19 character, completely new to smithing, seeks advice on what items he make. I can t remember right away what my skill level is at(very low, only the
ygData.messageBody:
Level 19 character, completely new to smithing, seeks advice on what items
he make. I can't remember right away what my skill level is at(very low,
only the max a half elf ranger can be trained to by the guildmaster in
Surefall Glade), but cleaning rusty weapons does not raise skill. Can
someone tell me where I can find flasks of water, and is it possible to use
bottles of water instead? Any advice would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you all
